mapper.select: select no, review_content,review_datetime,review_img, review_rate,review_userid,review_nickname,review_birth,welfare_id from ReviewWelfare order by no desc
select no, review_content,review_datetime,review_img, review_rate,review_userid,review_nickname,review_birth,welfare_id from ReviewWelfare where no = #{no}
mapper.update: update ReviewWelfare set review_content = #{review_content}, review_datetime = #{review_datetime}, review_img = #{review_img}, review_rate = #{review_rate}, review_userid = #{review_userid}, review_nickname = #{review_nickname}, review_birth = #{review_birth}, welfare_id = #{welfare_id} where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select no, review_content,review_datetime,review_img, review_rate,review_userid,review_nickname,review_birth,welfare_id from ReviewWelfare where welfare_id = #{id} order by no desc

select no, review_content,review_datetime,review_img, review_rate,review_userid,review_nickname,review_birth,welfare_id,w.place_name place_name from ReviewWelfare join Welfare w on welfare_id = w.id where review_userid = #{review_userid} order by no desc
